tossup_question: 25) EARTH AND SPACE  While you conduct a survey of the surrounding area after a volcanic eruption, which of the following rocks would you most likely encounter?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Shale
X) Slate
Y) Obsidian
Z) Lignite
bonus_question: 25) EARTH AND SPACE  While surveying the area, you noticed that the top of the volcano has collapsed, forming a large crater with a minimum diameter of 1 km. What would this crater be called?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Caldera
X) Cirque
Y) Fumarole
Z) Playa
